
0001 
APOLLONIUS RHODIUS Epic. 
(3 B.C.: Alexandrinus, Rhodius) 
Scholia et vitae: Cf. SCHOLIA IN APOLLONIUM RHODIUM (5012). 
0001 001 
Argonautica, ed. H. Fraenkel, Apollonii Rhodii Argonautica. 
Oxford: Clarendon Press, 1961 (repr. 1970 (1st edn. corr.)): 1-242. 
(Cod: 39,090: Epic.)

Fragmenta, ed. J.U. Powell, Collectanea Alexandrina. Oxford: 
Clarendon Press, 1925 (repr. 1970): 4-8. 
frr. 1-2, 5, 7-10, 12-13. 
(Q: 243: Epic., Epigr.) 
0001 003 
Epigramma, AG 11.275. 
Dup. 0001 002 (CA, p. 8, fr. 13). 
(Q: 16: Epigr.)

ATHENAEUS Soph.

CHILONIS EPISTULA

0533 
CALLIMACHUS Philol. 
(4-3 B.C.: Cyrenaeus) 
Scholia: Cf. SCHOLIA IN CALLIMACHUM (5016). 
Diegeseis: Cf. SCHOLIA IN CALLIMACHUM (5016). 
0533 003 
Epigrammata, ed. R. Pfeiffer, Callimachus, vol. 2. Oxford: 
Clarendon Press, 1953: 80-99. 
Epigr. 1-63. 
Dup. 0533 004. 
(Q: 1,984: Epigr.) 
0533 004 
Epigrammata, AG 5.6, 23, 146; 6.121, 146-150, 301, 
310-311, 347, 351; 7.80, 89, 170, 271-272, 277, 317-318, 344b, 415, 447, 
451, 453-454, 458-460, 471, 517-525, 725, 728; 9.336, 507, 565-566;

4145 X01
